verses.verse: You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

You shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> all the <S%H1870>way<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3212>led<s%> you these <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that he might <S%H6031>humble<s%> <S%H5254>you,<s%> to prove <S%H3045>you,<s%> to know what was in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> whether you would <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> or not.

He <S%H6031>humbled<s%> <S%H7456>you,<s%> and allowed you to be hungry, and <S%H398>fed<s%> you with <S%H4478>manna,<s%> which you <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know, neither did your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>know;<s%> that he might make you <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> does not <S%H2421>live<s%> by <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> but <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>lives<s%> by everything that <S%H4161>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Your <S%H8071>clothing<s%> <S%H1086>didn't<s%> grow old on <S%H7272>you,<s%> neither did your foot <S%H1216>swell,<s%> these <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

You shall <S%H3045>consider<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> that as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3256>chastens<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> so <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> chastens <S%H3256>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to fear <S%H3372>him.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> you into a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> of <S%H5869>springs,<s%> and <S%H8415>underground<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> flowing into <S%H1237>valleys<s%> and <S%H2022>hills;<s%>

a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H1612>vines<s%> and fig <S%H8384>trees<s%> and <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>trees<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%>

a <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4544>scarceness,<s%> you shall not <S%H2637>lack<s%> anything in <S%H776>it;<s%> a land whose <S%H68>stones<s%> are <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and out of whose <S%H2042>hills<s%> you may <S%H2672>dig<s%> <S%H5178>copper.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full,<s%> and you shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which he has given <S%H5414>you.<s%>

<S%H8104>Beware<s%> lest you <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> in not <S%H8104>keeping<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day:<s%>
<S%H398>lest,<s%> when you have eaten and are <S%H7646>full,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and lived <S%H3427>therein;<s%>

and when your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and your <S%H3701>silver<s%> and your <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and all that you have is <S%H7235>multiplied;<s%>

then your <S%H3824>heart<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up,<s%> and you <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%>

who <S%H3212>led<s%> you through the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> with <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents<s%> and <S%H6137>scorpions,<s%> and <S%H6774>thirsty<s%> ground where there was no <S%H4325>water;<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H2496>flint;<s%>

who <S%H398>fed<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> with <S%H4478>manna,<s%> which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know; that he might <S%H6031>humble<s%> <S%H5254>you,<s%> and that he might prove <S%H3190>you,<s%> to do you good at your latter <S%H319>end:<s%>
and lest you <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> "My <S%H3581>power<s%> and the <S%H6108>might<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H6213>gotten<s%> me this <S%H2428>wealth.<s%>"

But you shall <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> for it is he who <S%H5414>gives<s%> you <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H6213>get<s%> <S%H2428>wealth;<s%> that he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

It shall <S%H7911>be,<s%> if you shall <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7812>them,<s%> and worship <S%H5749>them,<s%> I testify against you this <S%H3117>day<s%> that you shall <S%H6>surely<s%> <S%H6>perish.<s%>

As the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> makes to <S%H6>perish<s%> before <S%H6440>you,<s%> so you shall <S%H6>perish;<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> you <S%H8085>wouldn't<s%> listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
